title: Vegetables and Cabbage Stir-Fry with Oyster Sauce
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat; saute broccoli, cauliflower, cabbage, and garlic in the hot oil until tender-crisp, about 5 minutes.
Remove pan from heat and drizzle oyster sauce over the vegetables mix and toss to coat.
ingredients: 1/2 head cabbage, cut into bite-size pieces
